answers.answer: Have you been drinking plenty of water? Sometimes dehydration can have a lot to do with the headaches. I'm currently battling a really bad one, but I drink almost a gallon of water a day now. Keeps everything functioning well. If not that, try reevaluating what you eat. If you have high blood sugar or blood pressure your head can also hurt. I have gestational diabetes and when my sugar isoff my head is the first sign.

I haven't been drinking much water :/ I try to make myself and will definately start trying to drink more!  My blood pressure is fine sometimes a little low and I'm not sure how my sugar is.  Thanks For the reply!  :)

question: I've been having a horrible headache all day.  I've tried napping and laying in a dark room all day and a little caffine but nothings working I just took 1 tylenol which will be the first time taking it since being pregnant. Anyone have any other ideas?
title: help with headache
